General.Name: Bluestone Resources Inc
General.Description: Bluestone Resources Inc. engages in the exploration and development of precious metals. Its flagship asset is the Cerro Blanco gold project located in Southern Guatemala in the department of Jutiapa. The company was formerly known as Indicator Minerals Inc. and changed its name to Bluestone Resources Inc. in January 2012. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 885 West Georgia, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3E8
